meanings.definition: The act of administering a drug to an athlete in order to enhance performance.
meanings.sent1: The dopings of the athlete were discovered during the competition.
meanings.sent2: Athletes who use dopings risk getting banned from sports.
meanings.sent3: The coach accidentally gave the wrong dopings to the athlete, causing a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The dopings of the sprinter propelled him to victory in the race.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of using illegal dopings can be severe for athletes.

meanings.sent1: The dopings found in the athlete's bag were confiscated by officials.
meanings.sent2: Some dopings are difficult to detect in routine drug tests.
meanings.sent3: The store mistakenly sold cooking spices as dopings to the athlete.
meanings.sent4: The dopings purchased online turned out to be counterfeit.
meanings.sent5: The investigation revealed a network distributing illegal dopings to athletes.

meanings.definition: The process of adding impurities to a semiconductor to alter its electrical properties.
meanings.sent1: The dopings in the semiconductor changed its conductivity.
meanings.sent2: Engineers carefully control the dopings in semiconductor manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The accidental dopings in the chip caused a malfunction in the device.
meanings.sent4: The precise dopings in the semiconductor improved its performance.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the dopings is crucial for optimizing semiconductor functionality.
